text: The King of Albania served as the Albanian head of state from 1190-1961. It descends way back to the Progoni Dynasty and Skanderbeg. == List of Monarchs == Name birth death Rule Skanderbeg 1405 1/17/1468 1443-1468 === Governors of Scutari === Mehmed Bushati (1757-1774) Mustafa I Bushati (1774-1778) Karamahmud Bushati (1778-1796) Ibrahim Bushati (1796-1810) Mustafa II Bushati /Sherifi (1810-1831) == List of Monarchs == Picture Name Reign Lifespan William 1914-1916 1876-1945 Charles I Austrohungarian Command: 1916-1918 1887-1922 William (2nd time) 1918-1928 1876-1945 === House of Zogu === Zog I of Albania (1928-1939) == King of Albania == Picture Name Reign Lifespan William (3rd time) 1939-1945 1876-1945 Zog (2nd time) 1945-1961 1895-1961 Carol victor 1945-1973 1913-1973 == Rulers of Albania == Leka Zogu (1943-1945) Zog (1945-1961) Carol victor (1961-1973) === Different Dynasties === Leka Zogu (2nd time) (1973-2011) Leka Zogu II (2011-Present) Category:Kings and Queens consort Category:History of Albania
title: King of Albania
